messages.subject: Re: sca samurai clans?
messages.msgSnippet: There is at least one in the sca its called the Genji clan (http://members.aol.com/arashisan/clan.html.  I have only had a small amount of contact with them
messages.messageBody:
There is at least one in the sca its called the Genji clan
(http://members.aol.com/arashisan/clan.html. I have only had a small
amount of contact with them (being in Amtgard not the SCA)but I do
belive that they are active. Amtgard does have a few Japanese clans
as well Clan Wakagashira (http://wakagashira.com/clan) and Clan Raion
(http://clanraion.qtneb.org/).

Hope it helps

Ambrose



--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Brian Magnia
<pompadour_samurai@y...> wrote:

> >because i would just like to have a view of what it was like to

of

dream.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] sca samurai clans?
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know, but I would like know if you find anything. tom helm  wrote: hello everyone who can help. ... Don t know about any SCA
messages.messageBody:
I don't know, but I would like know if you find anything.

tom helm <junkmail@...> wrote:>hello everyone who can help.
>
>i need to know if their are any groups i can join that basicly
>reenact the famous samurai battles and wear real armer and things
>because i would just like to have a view of what it was like to
>march into battle. i just want to have the experience first hand of
>what i have come to love.
>
>so if you have info please let me in on it. it is my life long dream.
>
Don't know about any SCA events, there are a number of events
reenacted in Japan. Not a reenactment really but one famous festival
is this:

http://web-japan.org/atlas/festivals/fes06.html

-t

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] sca samurai clans?
messages.msgSnippet: hello everyone who can help. i need to know if their are any groups i can join that basicly reenact the famous samurai battles and wear real armer and things
messages.messageBody:
hello everyone who can help.

i need to know if their are any groups i can join that basicly reenact the famous samurai battles and wear real armer and things because i would just like to have a view of what it was like to march into battle. i just want to have the experience first hand of what i have come to love.

so if you have info please let me in on it. it is my life long dream.
